list_definition.definition: to send through the air with force; to hurl or fling

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He threw the ball to her / threw her the ball.

list_definition.definition: (of a horse) to make its rider fall off

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was completely thrown by her question.

list_definition.definition: (in wrestling, judo etc) to wrestle (one’s opponent) to the ground.
